text: Théophile Berlier (1 February 1761 in Dijon – 12 September 1844 in Dijon) was a French jurist and politician, who was a member of the National Convention from 1792 until 1795. Category:1761 births Category:1844 deaths Category:Presidents of the National Convention Category:French lawyers Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:People from Dijon
title: Théophile Berlier
